name: Unstable States
description:
Unstable States

Controls:

Base Form Press 

WASD keys and Spacebar to Jump, You are unable to fight back in this form

Ball Form 

Press AD keys to roll up down and over surfaces. Try Smashing into enemies in this form.

Bouncer Form

Bounce around uncontrollable, use AD keys to try landing on enemies. Watch your head though hitting a ceiling will leave you dazed.

Turret Form

WASD keys and Spacebar to Jump and mouse click to fire projectiles.
